sentences: On Monday, Co-Chair Robert Mason invited general comments on the Co-Chairs` draft conclusions, noting that consultations on the terms of reference (TOR) for the synergies workshop are ongoing.
SAUDI ARABIA said consideration of the TOR for the synergies workshop should be postponed until a date is specified for the economic diversification workshop.
AOSIS proposed that the group begin by considering the results of the workshop on insurance and risk assessment.
The G-77/CHINA, with others, said they had not consulted within the Group on the draft conclusions and preferred postponing the discussions.
Co-Chair Mason adjourned the meeting to allow for consultations.
